# T2

## Portfolio

Let's do this computation in python.....



```{.r}
df_Hydro <- read.csv("PEQ_566010.csv")
df_Hydro <- df_Hydro[,c(2,1,3)]
mean_PEQ <- colMeans(df_Hydro)
sd_PEQ <- apply(df_Hydro, 2, sd)
df_Hydro_Norm <- cbind(P_mm = (df_Hydro[,1] - mean_PEQ[1]) / sd_PEQ[1], 
                       E_mm = (df_Hydro[,2] - mean_PEQ[2]) / sd_PEQ[2],
                       Q_mm = (df_Hydro[,3] - mean_PEQ[3]) / sd_PEQ[3])
```
